titles.title: FHA Reform Act of 1994
To amend the National Housing Act to reform and simplify the single family home mortgage insurance program of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 5/11/1994--Introduced. FHA Reform Act of 1994 - Amends the National Housing Act to: (1) revise single family housing insurance mortgage limitations; and (2) authorize a single family risk-sharing mortgage insurance program with State and local agencies.
